Automation Bot


Exact name hidden for legal purposes. Will keep this brief ;)


  • Bot built from scratch

  • Part of a much larger microservice architecture

  • Performs updates and maintainence events on 4000+ customers' data

  • Azure functions and services used: Time Trigger, Service bus queue, Key Vault

Tech used: C#, .Net, Azure, Protocol Buffer, Splunk

HealthTech



  • Web application built for UF neurosurgery clinic

  • Features include appointments, map navigation and notifications via messages

  • Was solely responsible for the navigation feature

  • Integrated Google Maps APIs (geolocation, distance matrix API, Direction API)

Tech used: MongoDB, Express, React, Node

Gator Trader



  • Web application intended to be used by UF students for textbooks exchange and sales

  • Features include searching, account management, contacts

Tech used: MongoDB, Express, React, Node

Budgeting Tool



  • Web Application built for company's internal quotation calculations

  • Developed Backend using PHP Laravel Framework with MySQL Database.

  • Implemented Restful APIs for data query

Tech used: PHP, Laravel, MySQL

Ingredient2Recipe Chatbot



  • ChatBot that provides the users with recipes based on the ingredient image the user sends

  • Integrated Google Cloud Vision APIs for image label recognition capabilities.

Tech used: PHP, Laravel, MySQL, Messenger Chatbot
